books.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
books.author: Douglas Adams
books.description: The misadventures of hapless human Arthur Dent, his alien friend Ford Prefect, and the universe's best (and worst) travel guide, the Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy.

books.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.author: Harper Lee
books.description: A young girl growing up in the South during the 1930s learns about injustice and prejudice when her father, a lawyer, defends a black man falsely accused of rape.

books.title: The Great Gatsby
books.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
books.description: Set in the Roaring Twenties, this novel tells the story of a mysterious millionaire named Jay Gatsby and his pursuit of the beautiful and unattainable Daisy Buchanan.

books.author: George Orwell
books.description: In a totalitarian society where independent thought is forbidden, a man named Winston Smith secretly rebels against the ruling party and falls in love with a fellow rebel named Julia.
